text: ara tumi yadi tadera jijnesa kara'ke mahakasamandali o prthibi srsti karechena,’ tara niscaya'i balabe'allah‌’. Tumi balo -- ''tomara ki tabe bhebe dekhecha -- tomara allah‌ke bada diye yadera upasana karacha, yadi allah amara jan'ya duhkhakasta ceye thakena tabe ki tara tamra kasta dura karate parabe, athaba tini yadi amara jan'ya karuna ceye thakena tabe ki tara tamra anugrahake rodha karate parabe? Balo -- ''allah‌i amara jan'ya yathesta. Tamra'i upare nirbhara karuka nirbharasila saba.’’
